cs63

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • cs63.Deck

  • public class Deck
extends Actor
    A deck of playing cards.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int NUM_CARDS
      The number of cards in a complete deck.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck()
      Constructs a full deck of cards and shuffles them.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void act()
      Deals a card when this deck is clicked on, placing it face-up in the upper-left corner of the world.
      Card dealCard()
      Deals a card.
      boolean hasCards()
      Checks whether this deck contains any more cards.

    • Field Detail

      • NUM_CARDS

        public static final int NUM_CARDS
        The number of cards in a complete deck.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck

        public Deck()
        Constructs a full deck of cards and shuffles them.

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()
        Deals a card when this deck is clicked on, placing it face-up in the upper-left corner of the world. This only deals one card per click, no matter how long the click lasts. The deck should be removed from the world when empty, as this will throw an exception if the deck is empty.
        Overrides:
        act in class Actor

      • hasCards

        public boolean hasCards()
        Checks whether this deck contains any more cards.
        Returns:
        true if cards remain, false if all have been dealt

      • dealCard

        public Card dealCard()
        Deals a card. That card will no longer be available in this deck. It is the caller's responsibility to make sure that at least one card remains in the deck before calling this.
        Returns:
        a card
